thread.title: Shell abandons controversial Arctic drilling plan
thread.title_full: Shell abandons controversial Arctic drilling plan - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: Shell abandons controversial Arctic drilling plan
text:
Photo: Tim Ireland, Associated Press A giant polar bear model, erected by protesters from Greenpeace, stands outside the Shell Building in London on Monday. A giant polar bear model, erected by protesters from Greenpeace,...
ANCHORAGE, Alaska — Royal Dutch Shell has abandoned its long quest to become the first company to produce oil in Alaska’s Arctic waters, darkening the nation’s long-term oil prospects and delighting environmental groups that tried to block the project. A giant polar bear model, erected by protesters from Greenpeace, stands outside the Shell Building in London on Monday. A giant polar bear model, erected by protesters from Greenpeace,...
